name: Levocetirizine Dihydrochloride

indications.text: levocetirizine dihydrochloride histamine h 1 -receptor antagonist indicated : • treatment uncomplicated skin manifestations chronic idiopathic urticaria ( 1.2 )

contraindications.text: levocetirizine dihydrochloride tablets available 5 mg breakable ( scored ) tablets , allowing 2.5 mg , needed . levocetirizine dihydrochloride tablets taken without regard food consumption .

warningsAndPrecautions: levocetirizine dihydrochloride tablets , usp 5 mg white film coated , scored , round , biconvex tablets debossed '161 ' one side ' h ' side . ndc : 71335-0789-1 : 30 tablets bottle ndc : 71335-0789-2 : 90 tablets bottle ndc : 71335-0789-3 : 28 tablets bottle ndc : 71335-0789-4 : 60 tablets bottle storage : store 20° 25° c ( 68° 77° f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . repackaged/relabeled : bryant ranch prepack , inc.burbank , ca 91504
indications_original: Levocetirizine dihydrochloride is a histamine H 1 -receptor antagonist indicated for: • The treatment of the uncomplicated skin manifestations of chronic idiopathic urticaria ( 1.2 )
contraindications_original: Levocetirizine dihydrochloride tablets are available as 5 mg breakable (scored) tablets, allowing for the administration of 2.5 mg, if needed. Levocetirizine dihydrochloride tablets can be taken without regard to food consumption.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Levocetirizine dihydrochloride tablets, USP 5 mg are white film coated, scored, round, biconvex tablets debossed with '161' on one side and 'H' on other side.
                  NDC: 71335-0789-1: 30 Tablets in a BOTTLE
                  NDC: 71335-0789-2: 90 Tablets in a BOTTLE
                  NDC: 71335-0789-3: 28 Tablets in a BOTTLE
                  NDC: 71335-0789-4: 60 Tablets in a BOTTLE
                  Storage:Store at 20° to 25° C (68° to 77° F) [see USP Controlled Room Temperature].
                  Repackaged/Relabeled by:Bryant Ranch Prepack, Inc.Burbank, CA 91504
adverseReactions_original: The use of levocetirizine dihydrochloride tablets are contraindicated in:
